title: Prohibits for-profit business to have any involvement in the management or operation of a charter school
summary: Prohibits for-profit business or corporate entity to have any involvement in the establishment, management or operation of a charter school.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3344

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. CLARK, PEOPLES-STOKES -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M.
         of  A.  COLTON,  GLICK,  GOTTFRIED,  LAVINE, ROBINSON -- read once and
         referred to the Committee on Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to eligibility to  estab-
         lish a charter school

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 1 of section 2851  of  the  education  law,  as
    2  amended  by  chapter  101  of  the  laws  of 2010, is amended to read as
    3  follows:
    4    1. An application to establish a charter school may  be  submitted  by
    5  teachers,  parents,  school  administrators,  community residents or any
    6  combination thereof.  Such application may be filed in conjunction  with
    7  a  college,  university, museum, educational institution, not-for-profit
    8  corporation exempt from taxation under paragraph 3 of subsection (c)  of
    9  section  501  of  the  internal  revenue  code or for-profit business or
   10  corporate entity authorized to do business in New York  state.  Provided
   11  however, for-profit business or corporate entities shall not be eligible
   12  to  submit  an  application  to  establish  a charter school pursuant to
   13  subdivision nine-a of section twenty-eight  hundred  fifty-two  of  this
   14  article,  or  operate  or  manage  a charter school for a charter issued
   15  pursuant to subdivision nine-a of section twenty-eight hundred fifty-two
   16  of this article. [For charter schools established in conjunction with  a
   17  for-profit  business  or corporate entity, the charter shall specify the
   18  extent of the entity's participation in the management and operation  of
   19  the  school]  UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES SHALL AN APPLICATION TO ESTABLISH A
   20  CHARTER SCHOOL OR APPROVAL TO OPERATE A CHARTER SCHOOL BE GRANTED  TO  A
   21  FOR-PROFIT  BUSINESS  OR  CORPORATE  ENTITY AUTHORIZED TO DO BUSINESS IN
   22  THIS STATE NOR IN ANY MANNER WHATSOEVER SHALL THEY HAVE  AN  INVOLVEMENT
   23  IN THE MANAGEMENT AND OPERATION OF A CHARTER SCHOOL.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06570-01-1

       A. 3344                             2

    1    S  2.  This  act shall take effect immediately, and shall apply to all
    2  applications to establish a charter school pending or submitted prior to
    3  such effective date and still pending as well  as  to  all  applications
    4  submitted on or after the effective date of this act.
